author: Tatiana Kraevskaya
title: Kuleba: Common defense and industrial space will help preserve peace in Europe | УНН
text: [Exclusive](/en/news/its-time-to-withdraw-ukrainian-land-from-corrupt-management-of-the-national-academy-of-agrarian-sciences-and-give-it-to-the-armed-forces-expert) It's time to withdraw Ukrainian land from corrupt management of the National Academy of Agrarian Sciences and give it to the Armed Forces - expert Russian army damaged a power facility in Sumy region, equipment was turned off in Kharkiv region amid Russian attacks - Ukrenergo [Exclusive](/en/news/how-to-break-the-fast-without-harming-the-body-and-not-pounce-on-junk-food-tips-from-a-gastroenterologist) How to break the fast without harming the body and not "pounce" on junk food: tips from a gastroenterologist [Exclusive](/en/news/compensation-to-ukrainians-for-property-destroyed-by-the-enemy-kyiv-scientific-research-institute-of-forensic-expertise-explained-how-the-amount-of-damage-is-determined) Compensation to Ukrainians for Property Destroyed by the Enemy: Kyiv Scientific Research Institute of Forensic Expertise explained how the amount of damage is determined [Exclusive](/en/news/the-case-of-minister-solsky-nabu-must-suspect-more-than-a-thousand-ato-soldiers-or-drop-all-charges) "The case of Minister Solsky": NABU must "suspect" more than a thousand ATO soldiers or drop all charges [Exclusive](/en/news/more-than-218-thousand-devices-delivered-to-ukrainian-students-and-teachers-for-learning-in-war-conditions) More than 218 thousand devices delivered to Ukrainian students and teachers for learning in war conditions [Exclusive](/en/news/setup-and-political-persecution-mps-on-the-minister-solskyi-case) Setup and political persecution: MPs on the "Minister Solskyi case" [Exclusive](/en/news/excise-stamp-examinations-biological-and-trace-evidence-kyiv-scientific-research-institute-of-forensic-expertise-told-how-to-identify-smuggled-cigarettes-and-counterfeits-of-well-known-brands) Excise stamp examinations, biological and trace evidence: Kyiv Scientific Research Institute of Forensic Expertise told how to identify smuggled cigarettes and counterfeits of well-known brands [Exclusive](/en/news/approximately-every-eighth-development-on-the-brave1-platform-uses-ai) Approximately every eighth development on the Brave1 platform uses AI [Exclusive](/en/news/voting-for-or-against-solskys-resignation-is-expected-during-the-plenary-week-what-agribusiness-players-say) Voting for or against Solsky's resignation is expected during the plenary week: what agribusiness players say Kuleba: Common defense and industrial space will help preserve peace in Europe Italian defense minister calls for peace talks with Putin - Reuters Death toll from rains in southern Brazil rises to 78, many missing russia does not rule out increasing its missile arsenal amid confrontation with the West Law on mobilization: we should not expect radical changes to the rules of border crossing - Demchenko The state reimburses businesses for the costs of arranging workplaces for people with disabilities Take care of your health: the NHSU told how women can get a free medical consultation Putin's "inauguration": a number of countries refused to send their representatives to Moscow Russian oil exports fell to a post-pandemic low due to UAV attacks on Russian refineries Electronic cabinet of persons liable for military service to be launched in early June Popular The Lord of the Rings actors honored the memory of Bernard Hill, who played the role of King Theoden The Fall Guy grossed a modest $28.5 million at the box office in its first weekend, with Star Wars in second place A rally of thousands in support of anti-corruption newcomer Magyar took place in Hungary May 6: International No Diet Day, Coloring Day russian interior ministry puts former Ukrainian ministers Avakov and Stets on the wanted list What to watch: review of series premieres in May Publications Holy fire: miracle or hoax? And where to watch the broadcast of the descent of fire "The Minister's Case: Supreme Court resolves dispute over land that, according to NABU, ATO soldiers "squeezed" from agrarian academy A million-dollar gift could not be hidden: how a wife "betrayed" her husband's wealth NAAS land bank was empty before privatization: negligence of "agrarian scientists" was to blame Expert: Hetmantsev wants to neutralize entrepreneurs' pressure to reboot tax authorities with "White Business Club" Kuleba: Common defense and industrial space will help preserve peace in Europe Russia's aggression requires a united European wartime economy and defense industry to deter it and preserve peace on the continent. Italian defense minister calls for peace talks with Putin - Reuters Italian Defense Minister Guido Crozetto called for peace talks with Putin to end the war in Ukraine, saying that economic sanctions have not worked and the West should make more efforts to find a diplomatic solution to end the war in Ukraine. Death toll from rains in southern Brazil rises to 78, many missing At least 78 people have died and more than 115,000 have been displaced by severe flooding caused by heavy rains in the southern Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Sul. russia does not rule out increasing its missile arsenal amid confrontation with the West russia may be considering increasing its missile arsenal to deter the West amid open confrontation and deteriorating relations caused by its invasion of Ukraine. Law on mobilization: we should not expect radical changes to the rules of border crossing - Demchenko The law on mobilization may introduce some changes to the rules for crossing the state border for certain categories of people, but according to a spokesperson for the State Border Guard Service, no radical changes are expected. The state reimburses businesses for the costs of arranging workplaces for people with disabilities Ukraine launches a program to compensate employers up to UAH 106,000 for equipping workplaces for people with disabilities of groups I or II. Take care of your health: the NHSU told how women can get a free medical consultation The National Health Service reminded women how they can get free gynecological advice, including pregnancy monitoring, tests and examinations, by contacting medical institutions that have an agreement with the NHSU. Putin's "inauguration": a number of countries refused to send their representatives to Moscow A number of EU countries, including the Czech Republic, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania, have announced that they will not send representatives to the so-called "inauguration" of Russian President Vladimir Putin on May 7. Russian oil exports fell to a post-pandemic low due to UAV attacks on Russian refineries Russian oil exports in April 2024 fell to their lowest level since the COVID-19 pandemic due to drone attacks by Ukraine on Russian refineries. Electronic cabinet of persons liable for military service to be launched in early June In early June, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine plans to launch an electronic cabinet for persons liable for military service, which will allow citizens to access information about their military records.
